long_description: The PROBAR Core(TM) bar packs 20g of plant protein and plenty of real, recognizable ingredients into a bar that tastes great and helps you recover from intense activity. Use these protein bars as a great-tasting snack when you're on the go and to help build lean muscle and support recovery after a workout. All flavors contain chia and flax seeds, which are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, antioxidants, protein and fiber. Gluten free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The PROBAR Core(TM) bar packs 20g of plant protein and plenty of real, recognizable ingredients into a bar that tastes great and helps you recover from intense activity.
